item.title: 债券投资者押注谷歌再创百年辉煌
item.description:
Alphabet发售百年债券，这是自1997年以来科技公司首次发行此类债券。

【原文：

Alphabet’s sale of century bond is the first by a tech company since 1997.

】

item.title: 苹果、谷歌提出应用商店改革方案以消除英国竞争与市场管理局的担忧
item.description: 英国反垄断监管机构宣布，苹果公司和谷歌母公司Alphabet承诺对应用商店进行改革，以确保对开发者和消费者公平。这是英国根据其数字市场法规首次获得科技巨头的承诺。【原文：Apple Inc. and Alphabet Inc.’s Google committed to making app stores changes to ensure fairness to developers and consumers, the UK’s antitrust watchdog said announcing the first assurances from Big Tech firms under the country’s digital market rules.】

item.title: Spotify凭借"年度回顾"活动创下用户增长纪录
item.description: 瑞典音乐流媒体巨头Spotify Technology SA新增用户数远超分析师预期，创下单季度新增用户数最高纪录。【原文：Spotify Technology SA, the Swedish music streaming giant, signed up significantly more users than analysts expected, setting a corporate record for most users added in a single quarter.】

item.title: 华尔街公司曾与受制裁寡头家族信托合作
item.description: 2016年创立纽约对冲基金Mantle Ridge约六个月后，首席执行官保罗·希拉尔飞赴莫斯科，向俄罗斯最富有的人之一推介了一项潜在投资项目。【原文：About six months after founding the New York hedge fund Mantle Ridge in 2016, Chief Executive Officer Paul Hilal flew to Moscow and pitched a potential investment to one of Russia’s richest men.】

item.title: 为何科技界痴迷于机器人社交网络Moltbook
item.description: 就像Reddit，但专为机器人设计。【原文：It’s like Reddit, but for bots.】

item.title: 俄罗斯监管机构开始限制Telegram访问权限，RBC报道
item.description: 俄罗斯通讯监管机构联邦通信监管局计划从周二起限制Telegram的访问，RBC通讯社援引未具名知情人士消息报道称。【原文：Russia’s communications watchdog, Roskomnadzor, plans to limit access to Telegram from Tuesday, the RBC news service reported, citing people familiar with the situation that it didn’t identify.】

item.title: 泰国大选后，阿努廷核心内阁团队保持完整
item.description: 时隔数周，泰国内阁高层部长们周二齐聚曼谷政府大厦时，终于能松一口气了。【原文：For the first time in weeks, Thailand’s top cabinet ministers could breathe a sigh of relief as they gathered Tuesday at Government House in Bangkok.】

item.title: CapVest确认正洽谈收购欧洲能源基础设施公司TSG
item.description: CapVest Partners已与私募股权公司HLD展开独家谈判，拟收购能源基础设施企业TSG的多数股权。【原文：CapVest Partners has entered into exclusive talks to acquire a majority stake in energy infrastructure firm TSG from private equity firm HLD.】

item.title: 英国国债上涨，因突然罢免斯塔默的风险消退
item.description: 英国借贷成本周二小幅回落，因基尔·斯塔默巩固了其首相地位，突发性领导层更迭的风险随之消退。【原文：UK borrowing costs dipped on Tuesday as Keir Starmer shored up his position as prime minister and the risk of a sudden leadership change faded.】

item.title: 美国国债上涨，收益率逼近四周低点，数据发布在即
item.description: 美国国债正朝着连续第二个交易日上涨的方向发展，此前美国经济数据和美联储官员的讲话可能强化进一步降息的理由。【原文：Treasuries are heading for a second straight day of gains ahead of US economic data and speeches from Federal Reserve officials that may reinforce the case for further interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 科技股波动凸显美国股市多元化布局需求
item.description: 美国股市中科技股曾势不可挡的上涨势头已演变为跌宕起伏的行情，迫使投资者转向经营稳健的老牌传统经济企业寻求避风港。【原文：The tech sector’s once relentless push higher in the US stock market has turned into a topsy-turvy ride, forcing investors to seek calmer waters where stodgy, old-economy companies ply their trades.】

item.title: 尼日利亚今年将向私营投资者出售国有资产
item.description: 尼日利亚计划今年开始向私营投资者出售国有资产，当局正致力于推动经济改革，旨在吸引资本流入这个西非国家。【原文：Nigeria plans to start selling state-owned assets to private investors this year, as the authorities seek to leverage economic reforms aimed at drawing capital to the West African nation.】

item.title: 印度首次对"暗黑舰队"采取行动，扣押三艘油轮
item.description: 印度海岸警卫队扣押了三艘据称参与石油走私的油轮，这是该国对所谓"暗黑船队"采取强硬态度的首次迹象。【原文：The Indian Coast Guard seized three tankers that it said were involved in oil smuggling, the first sign of the country getting tough on the so-called dark fleet.】

item.title: 进口延迟导致部分印尼糖厂停产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由于政府延迟发放进口许可证，印尼至少两家糖厂被迫停产。【原文：At least two Indonesian sugar refineries have been forced to halt production due to delays in receiving import permits from the government, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 《部落冲突：皇室战争》开发商称游戏发行商正"坐享其成"
item.description: 芬兰电子游戏开发商Supercell计划连续第二年将新产品研发支出翻倍，其首席执行官表示，增长缓慢的行业需要更多创新。【原文：Finnish video-game maker Supercell plans to double its spending on new-product development for the second straight year, with its chief executive officer saying the slow-growing industry needs to innovate more.】

item.title: 凯雷集团以2.32亿美元收购印度Nido住房金融公司多数股权
item.description: 凯雷集团已同意以约210亿卢比（合2.32亿美元）收购印度Nido住房金融公司多数股权。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. has agreed to acquire a majority stake in India’s Nido Home Finance Ltd. for about 21 billion rupees ($232 million).】

item.title: 拉斯·温德霍斯特因违背债券回购协议在美国被起诉
item.description: 深陷诉讼漩涡的德国金融家拉斯·温德霍斯特近日在美国被起诉，指控其未能偿还与迪拜某金融公司债券交易产生的数百万美元债务。【原文：Lars Windhorst, the embattled German financier who has faced multiple lawsuits in recent years, was sued in the US for allegedly failing to repay millions of dollars in debts arising from a bond deal with a finance firm in Dubai.】

item.title: 法国国民联盟支持黄金涨至每盎司6000美元，因涨势"合乎逻辑"
item.description: 法国巴黎银行分析师戴维·威尔逊表示，随着宏观经济和地缘政治风险持续存在，金价可能在年底前攀升至每盎司6000美元，黄金与白银的比价也将走高。【原文：Gold may climb to $6,000 an ounce by the end of the year and bullion’s ratio to silver is set to rise as macroeconomic and geopolitical risks persist, BNP Paribas SA’s David Wilson said.】

item.title: 中国太阳能电池价格上涨冲击印度供应链
item.description: 中国太阳能电池价格的飙升正令印度组件制造商感到不安，这些企业依赖邻国供应这一关键组件。【原文：Surging prices of solar cells from China are rattling Indian module makers who depend on the neighboring nation for the essential component.】

item.title: 埃及鹅肝酱销售商Gourmet上市首日股价上涨
item.description: 埃及高端食品杂货商Gourmet Egypt SAE在埃及证券交易所首次公开募股（IPO）首日股价飙升38%，创下该国今年首例IPO的最高涨幅纪录。【原文：Shares of premium grocer Gourmet Egypt SAE rose as much as 38% in their debut on the Egyptian stock exchange, in the country’s first initial public offering of the year.】

item.title: 赞比亚财政部长称将在八月大选后敲定与国际货币基金组织的协议
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长西通贝科·穆索科特瓦内表示，该国将在定于8月举行的全国大选后，才与国际货币基金组织就新经济计划展开磋商。【原文：Zambia will only conclude talks with the International Monetary Fund for a new economic program after general elections set for August, Finance Minister Situmbeko Musokotwane said.】

item.title: 钻石行业低迷促使博茨瓦纳提议提高所得税
item.description: 博茨瓦纳计划提高企业税和个人所得税，以弥补钻石收入的下滑，并遏制不断扩大的预算赤字。【原文：Botswana plans to raise corporate and personal taxes to offset a slump in diamond revenue and rein in a widening budget deficit.】

item.title: 私募基金Harith正洽谈收购南非最大航空公司
item.description: 南非私募股权公司哈里斯通用合伙公司计划收购廉价航空公司FlySafair，这家管理着30亿美元资产的投资机构正扩大其在非洲大陆的交通运输投资组合。【原文：South African private equity firm Harith General Partners plans to acquire budget carrier FlySafair as the investor with $3 billion in assets expands its transport portfolio on the continent.】

item.title: 字母表公司通过英镑和瑞士法郎市场达成巨额债务交易
item.description: 字母公司首次发行英镑和瑞士法郎计价债券，其中包括极其罕见的百年期债券，此前该公司已在美国完成一笔200亿美元的巨额债券交易。【原文：Alphabet Inc. is selling sterling and Swiss franc-denominated bonds for the first time, including an ultra-rare issue of a 100-year note, following a bumper $20 billion deal in the US.】

item.title: 日本长期国债上涨，因高市早苗胜选缓解财政担忧
item.description: 日本政府债券价格上涨，因首相高市早苗赢得历史性选举胜利，提振了投资者信心，认为市场能够消化增加的财政支出。【原文：Japan’s government bonds gained after Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s historic election triumph fueled confidence among investors that increased fiscal spending can be digested by the market.】

item.title: 中国债券期货持仓量创纪录，多头押注激增
item.description: 中国政府债券近期反弹正吸引更多交易员投身衍生品市场，这反映出随着债券市场信心增强，投资者对避险和对冲的需求日益旺盛。【原文：Chinese government bonds’ recent recovery is drawing more traders into derivatives, reflecting stronger demand for safety and hedging as confidence in the debt market grows.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券交易所寻求新任首席执行官，海伦·洛夫特豪斯将于五月卸任
item.description: 据声明称，澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司备受争议的首席执行官海伦·洛夫特豪斯将于五月卸任。【原文：Helen Lofthouse, the embattled chief executive officer of ASX Ltd., is set to step down from her role in May, according to a statement.】

item.title: 意大利西雅美银行利润符合预期，首席执行官着眼于与Mediobanca的整合
item.description: 西恩纳蒙特帕斯基银行第四季度利润符合预期，首席执行官路易吉·洛瓦廖正致力于推进对竞争对手梅迪奥银行的收购。【原文：Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA profit in the fourth quarter met expectations, as Chief Executive Officer Luigi Lovaglio focuses on implementing the takeover of rival Mediobanca SpA.】

item.title: 巴克莱承诺向投资者分红150亿英镑，此前其盈利超预期
item.description: 巴克莱银行表示，将在2028年前向股东返还至少150亿英镑（205亿美元），同时继续推进削减成本、提升盈利能力的长期计划。【原文：Barclays Plc said it will return at least £15 billion ($20.5 billion) to shareholders through 2028 as it continues to work through a long-term plan to slash costs and improve profitability.】

item.title: 肯尼亚计划修改养老金法，允许提前提取储蓄
item.description: 肯尼亚正考虑允许劳动者提前提取养老金储蓄，作为鼓励购买退休产品计划的一部分。【原文：Kenya is considering allowing workers early access to their pension savings, as part of a plan to encourage take-up of retirement products.】
